overview: <a href="http://joehall.me/">Joe Hall</a> is the founder and CEO of <a href="http://22media.com/">22 Media LLC</a>. Through his work he has expierence on both the national and local levels around a variety of diverse topics and technologies. Joe’s work has garnerd the attention of some of the biggest technology publications in the world, including white papers from MIT and The Department of Homeland Security.
